docs.text: Documentation: https://auredentan.github.io/starlette-session/ Starlette Session ¤ Starlette session is a simple session middleware for starlette . It gives you the possibility of backend session with a predefined backend or a custom one. Requirements ¤ Python 3.6+ Installation ¤ pip install starlette-session
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: Starlette session is a simple session middleware for starlette . It gives you the possibility of backend session with a predefined backend or a custom one.
